divs: Sighting Details1. We were driving entering the town of Ranchita. 2. I noticed a bright light tomy left. I turned my head just in time to see very intense short tail of light.My son who was next to me was angled in that direction for a complete veiw. 3.UFO 4. Talked with my son too see if he saw the same thing.5. The saucerappeared and disappeared in about one second, the tail also disappeared.6. Theobject vanished I only assume it was traveling due to the light tail behind thesaucer.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ranchita
This sighting has never been favorited.
